00027 //WARING: IMPORTANT: Do not change this buffer for some reason, because this buffer
00028 //is strictly dependent on the buffersize on the Unit Test Management Tools (host tools).
00029 //The socket communication on the X60 target is highly instable, when the host
00030 //tool reads faster than the socket can write. this can cause your X60 to crash.
00031 //this buffer sends 25 test handles at once, then the host tools waits for some time
00032 //to let the buffer be refilled.
00033 #define c_test_case_handle_buffer_size 100
00034 
00035
